profile:
We provide both homeowners and businesses with repairs and installations.
If you take a look at our testimonials, you'll find that our customers say we are on time, on budget, and go the extra mile. We take the time to listen to you and plan out the most cost-effective, energy-efficient, and environmentally-friendly system that will fit your needs. We work on all major brands. At the end of the job, we clean up your home or business like we'd never been there. We also make sure that you know how to use your system and help you with the paperwork for rebates or tax credits.

Right now, if you install new energy-efficient heating and air conditioning equipment, the Federal Government will give you up to $500 in tax credits. This can significantly cut you income tax bill this year as well as save on your energy bills and reduce your carbon footprint for years to come. If you give me a call at one of the phone numbers below, I'll go over this with you.

Also, for your convenience, we work until 6 p.m. weekdays and until 1 p.m. on Saturdays.

I will be happy to answer any questions and provide you with the information that you need, whether it's regarding a air conditioning repair or installation. Please give me a call at 416.573.7212 if you would like a more comfortable home or business while saving on energy and money.
service_area: Toronto, Scarborough, Pickering, Markham, Oshawa, Richmond Hill, Woodbridge, Vaughan, Etobicoke, North York. 416-573-7212

specialities:

Experience the difference when a clean, courteous technician shows up on time, completes the work promptly, answers your questions, and is trained in all the latest advancements. We guarantee our work and promise you the highest level of customer service.

profile:
ABOUT US:
Green Care Energy (GCE) has been serving the GTA for over 10 years. We are an authorized American Standard dealer while also providing all other brands. GCE has gained the trust of their customers over the years because we provide the highest level of standard when it comes to customer satisfaction. With our highly qualified experts were able to provide fast and reliable service and products. Treating each customer with respect and fairness has always been our company policy, which has lead to the success and growth of our company. Building long term relationships with our customers is our objective and the long term goal of our company. 

	WHY CHOSE GCE?
Green Care Energy will ensure a proper installation with a quality unit to reach the highest  efficiency and performance the equipment should achieve. Our team of experts will help you select the right 	equipment for your home or commercial business , installed with the highest accuracy with respect to its specification, and maintain your equipment to ensure a long and efficient performance.

profile:
CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to serve your HVAC needs quickly, efficiently and professionally with 24/7 emergency service at an affordable rate to keep you calm and comfortable at anytime.  

Specializing in service, installation, maintenance and repairs on all related HVACR equipment whether it's your system that's unfortunately malfunctioned, a newer more sophisticated energy efficient system needing upgrading or general tune ups & preventative maintenance on your existing system, CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to satisfy your needs with peace of mind being priority. 

Service all makes and models of HVACR equipment in Residential, Commercial & Industrial sectors of the industry on:

profile:
Nationwide Home Comfort specializes in quality residential HVAC services throughout Ontario. We are one of the fastest growing Home Services providers that pride ourselves in giving our customers the best possible service and top-notch products. Our installation and service teams are among the most knowledgeable in the industry, and undergo strict training and development.

Why Choose Nationwide?

Quality On Time Service
We guarantee same day service or installation on all of our products, being focused on our service commitment is a standard at Nationwide Home Comfort. We have a large network of certified technicians on call, at all times. 
 
Seamless Installation, Top Notch Products
Nationwide Home Comfort installs only the best, most advanced HVAC and Water Treatment products Installed by our certified technicians. Making your home more comfortable.

More than your basic customer service 
From our call centre agents to our service technicians, we're committed to providing the best advice to ensure your home comfort.

Thorough Energy Assessments
At Nationwide Home Comfort we provide each customer with a thorough energy assessment walking you through exactly what you can expect to save, rebates you will receive, and all of the benefits of upgrading.
 
100% Coverage Guaranteed 
Our large network of certified technicians are on call 24 hours per day to provide you with worry-free coverage for the lifetime of any Rent-to-Own equipment. Guaranteed.

profile:
Our mechanical experts are dedicated to completing your project (large or small) with quality results, on time, and within your budget. We are a family owned and operated business servicing the GTA, with extensive experience and knowledge in forced air heating and cooling, hot water heating, ductless heating and cooling, and gas fireplace installs

If you are looking to simply upgrade your heating and cooling or renovate your entire mechanical system, Brandelle Mechanical can help you. We team up with architects and engineers to get full mechanical permits and architectural drawings to get the job done right, to code, on time, and within your budget.

With our team of technicians we offer forced air heating and cooling, ductless heating and cooling, hot water heating, and radiant in-floor heating. We also offer tankless water heaters, conventional hot water tanks, gas-piping, humidifiers, air purification, and top quality fireplaces to improve the aesthetic of any room or home.

As Tempstar, Keeprite, Goodman, Napoleon, and Olsen dealers we offer our customers the finest products at competitive pricing.

To make our products affordable on any budget we also offer rental programs on tankless water heaters, hot water tanks, furnaces, boilers, and air conditioners.

Additionally we offer 24/7 service on all mechanical appliances!
service_area: Toronto, Etobicoke, Vaughan, Brampton, Mississauga, Richmond Hill, Scarborough and Cottage Country.
products:
LICENSED DEALERS of Keeprite, Goodman, Tempstar Furnaces, Air conditioners, Mini Splits, Air handlers and exhaust equipment.
LICENSED DEALERS of Mitsubishi Electric Heating and Cooling products, Mini Split AC, Heat pumps and accessories. 
LICENSED DEALER Generac generators and power systems  
LICENSED Olsen Dealer of Hot Water Heating equipment, Boilers, expansion tanks and circulation pumps.
Stellrad radiator dealer 
John Wood Hot water Tanks 
Tankless water heaters from Navien, Norritz, Takagi as well as wall hung Boilers
LICENSED Napoleon fire place dealer
LICENSED Valor fire place dealer
services:
Our team of service technicians as well as mechanical designer can take a project from design to completion. 
We offer Re&Re installs of furnace, AC, mini split ac systems, boilers, hot water tanks, tankless water heaters, rad replacement, Generac generators, fireplaces, humidifiers, thermostats, as well as gas piping.
Full mechanical design, permitting, install and inspection for new or custom home construction. 
Code violation, TSSA violation and Red Tag repair.
Annual maintenance of ALL heating and cooling products as well service contracts.

profile: A Universal Heating & Cooling Inc. was established by a group of professionals with over 20 years experience in the heating & cooling business and have been one of the leaders in HVAC industry. We offer our customers quality equipment at a very competitive price in the GTA and beyond. Our company has maintained an A+ BBB rating for over 10 years. Call us today
products: We install, service, and sell Furnaces, Air conditioners, Air cleaners, Humidifiers, Thermostats, boilers, hot water/tankless hot water and more in economical, performance, and high efficiency packages. Ask about our biggest sale ever where you can save up to $1000 on many different products. All products come with 10 years parts and labor warranty.
services: 24 hours service, 7 days a week across the GTA. We specialize in Installation & Service of all Makes or Models of Furnace & Air Conditioners. We do electric and oil furnace conversions to gas. We use the most advanced equipment in the world, built for the practical day to day heating and cooling needs of Canadian summer and winter temperatures. Due to Universal Heating & Cooling’s exceptional quality and professional service, we have been growing at an unprecedented rate.
brands: We service all models and makes.

profile: A M Garner Inc., Mercury Control Services DBA has been in the HVAC industry / electrical industry and has been proudly servicing the Houston and surrounding areas since 1964. We service residential and commercial HVAC and electrical. We specialize in commercial heating and cooling, system replacements including chilled water equipment, service, repair maintenance and commercial electrical build outs. Residential system replacements, service and maintenance. Our mission at Mercury Control Services is to successfully provide each and every customer with world class customer service and finding solutions to all your commercial and residential needs, in both air conditioning, heating and electrical. With almost 50 years of experience in the heating, cooling and electrical arenas we believe we have what is needed to provide you with the best possible solutions.

profile: Whether you're in the market for a new floor or just want to update the existing one, the Floor Heating Guys of Toronto offers both traditional and modern solutions for radiant floor heating. Both systems utilize water from the home's hot water heater or a separate boiler system to heat the floor. The water is carried throughout the flooring with tubing.

Same Day Emergency Service - Serving All GTA

We Repair All Brands Of Furnaces (Lennox, Carrier, Goodmans, Keep Right, American Standard, Trane, Luxair, Amana)

Fully Tssa Certified & Insured!

Professional, Affordable And Honest Service Guaranteed

We Repair, Service & Install: • Furnace & A/C Maintenance and Installation • Duct Work • Gas Lines • Water & Tankless Heaters • Fireplaces & Humidifiers • Indoor/Outdoor Gas Piping Installation (BBQs, Gas Dryers, Kitchen Stoves, etc) • Gas Leaks (CO Levels) • All Safety Checks • Remove Issued Red Tags • Nest, Ecobee, and Smart Thermostat installation • Service all makes & models: Lennox, Carrier, Amana, Trane, Goodman, American Standard, and more!

Reasonable Prices, All Work Is Guarante

profile:
Reputable Canadian HVAC professionals offering total heating and cooling solutions 24/7 365. 

Residential and Light Commercial customers can conveniently book a technician online, through our website. You will be sent confirmation and notified by email or SMS message when your technician is on route, and arriving at the destination.

Furnaces, Air conditioners, Water treatment and Filters can be purchased through our online store at the very best prices, installations charged separate. 

Products come with same day delivery* , Money Back Guarantees and Warranty. All installers are Ontario licenced, insured and adhere to all federal and provincial Codes.

Order Quality Furnaces & Technicians Direct to your Door!

profile:
Established by a group of professionals with many years of experience in the Heating & Cooling industry, beloved by its customers for high quality of workmanship and support.
At New Tech Home Services we understand that replacement of old Heating, Cooling and Water Heater equipment is not to be taken lightly. This is why we pride ourselves on offering the highest service and professional integrity in our customer approach.
We offer a range of payment and financing options for our product. Customer comfort is our main priority. Choose from cash, credit, deferred payment or simply billing through your utility bill.

15+ years of operation grants us an understanding and knowledge of heating & cooling that is without parallel. This translates to the lowest competitive product prices and industry knowledge of our consultants and technicians alike. You can rest assured that we know and understand the heating and cooling needs, and best interests of your household.

So have a look around the site, familiarize yourself with what New Tech Home Services is all about and see the types of options and savings that are available to you.
Then get in touch with us – we’ll make sure you understand everything and help you every step of the way.

New Tech Home Services Technicians and Representatives Are Fully Licensed, Insured and Bonded.
Call us toll free: 1-888-507-9992

NewTechHome Services is a proud authorized dealer of Goodman equipment  in the GTA. We deal with many worldwide respected companies such as John wood, KeepRite, Rinnai, American Standard and others. 
www.newtechhomeservice.ca

profile:
Manley's Boiler, Inc. is a full service boiler company that sells, services, leases and installs boilers and associated equipment for residential, commercial and industrial clients. Regarded as one of the most trusted boiler manufacturers in California, Manley’s Boiler, Inc. employs LACC, MSHAW, and RSO certified and trained staff. At Manley’s Boiler, Inc., we offer service and repair 24 hours a day, seven days a week with certified welders trained in California.

Manley’s Boiler, Inc. is a California boiler works company with an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau, and has been around since 1948. With certifications from ASME and NBIC, as well as approval from PICS and ISNetworld, Manley’s Boiler, Inc. is ISO compliant. Trust in a business with a long history of success.
